headline: M&T Bank (NYSE:MTB) Sees 10% Weekly Decline Due To New US Tariffs
summary: M&T Bank (NYSE:MTB) experienced a 10% decline last week, parallel to the broader market turmoil triggered by the newly announced tariffs from the U.S. President, which caused significant drops in major indices like the Dow and S&P 500. The financial sector, in which M&T Bank operates, was under pressure as investor sentiment shifted amid escalating fears about the trade war and its economic impact. While the bank's specific factors were not highlighted, the widespread sell-off across...
